ai-patthana16.75:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.75:0.3_0: always looking forwards and moving along,
ai-patthana16.75:1.1_0: Not seeing the cause of impingement, not for the sake of non-arising of grasping.
ai-patthana16.75:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana16.75:4.1_0: You don’t give rise to repulsion. ...
ai-patthana16.75:4.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.75:5.1_0: the eighteen bases for eighteen years ...
